name: EatDots
description:
A game made for the "a game by its cover 2017"-Jam.
All graphics except the Cover are drawn by hand.

You can move with Up and Down or clicking in the upper or
lower half of the screen.
Download the game for higher Quality.

You must collect the dots and avoid monster.
Also it is your goal to balance out the number of dots per color.
When you don't do this the monster of this color will eat you.

The bug for glitch lyfe is that the speed doesn't reset, after you lose.

How many points can you get write it in the comments.
